lines.text:
[waiting with Carol to meet Mrs. Kingsley]
Oh, don't worry - I'll make a good impression.

[he sits on an old chair and in collapses just as Matilda comes into the room screaming in horror]
My antique chair!

[relieved]
Well, I'm glad it was only an old one.

[to Wade Jr]
Wade Kingsley Junior? That's what they mean by a family skeleton, huh?
Well, I tell you what we could do. We could first ...
There's no "we!" There's "me" and there's "you," and "you" I don't want to see anymore!
Yeah, but I thought maybe even ...
Don't "thought!" It's over! Good-bye and good luck!
